segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and spot the woman by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's focused on drying that plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet's on full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing, water sheeting down everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water, but she hasn't reacted at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, kids are up to something with the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy's on a stool, hand deep in the cookie jarâ€”wow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tipping back; that's alarming!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, like she's in on the surprise raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, garden calm through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe this chaos is going unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a hidden disaster in plain sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a startling scene to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
